gameManager module

Core game manager that controls game state, objects and the main loop.

class gameManager.GameManager(*args, **kwargs)
addPoints(amount)
Parameters:

amount (int)

canAffordBuilding(creator)
Return type:

bool

checkEvents()
create_new_mine()

Locate a random empty cell and create/place a Mine that produces 1. Used by external gm_upgrades logic.

Return type:

bool

draw()

Delegamos el loop de draw a gm_draw.py

new_game()

Inicializa los elementos del juego: carga mapa si existe o crea uno por defecto.

process_action_buffer(max_per_frame=5)

Process up to max_per_frame queued upgrade actions.

Actions are retried up to max_tries. If an action is successfully applied we decrement the remaining uses and remove it from the queue. If an action repeatedly fails it will be dropped after max_tries.

Parameters:

max_per_frame (int)

save_and_exit()

Save map to App/saves/map.json

unlock_next_well_if_needed()

Comprueba si la puntuación actual alcanza el objetivo del siguiente pozo bloqueado y lo desbloquea (se usa la tupla self.well_objectives).

update()

Delegamos el loop de update a gm_update.py
